biotools.summary: The BioDeep database is a comprehensive database of metabolite information in living organisms: by aggregating metabolite information from multiple public databases and large-scale natural language text mining work, we have built a large scale knowledge network for biological knowledge interpretation. By using the BioDeep database, it is possible to query such large scale metabolic knowledge network.

bioschemas.name: BioDeep Database
bioschemas.summary: The BioDeep database is a comprehensive database of metabolite information in living organisms: by aggregating metabolite information from multiple public databases and large-scale natural language text mining work, we have built a large scale knowledge network for biological knowledge interpretation.
